root.name: Whomp 'Em
root.description: Developed and published by Jaleco, Whomp 'Em is an action platformer that features a Native American protagonist. The player is tasked with completing 6 element-themed levels, each level the player completes gives them access to a new weapon, much like in the Mega Man series. In Japan, the game is based on the Monkey King legend and is titled Saiyuki World 2 and is the sequel to Saiyuki World.
